long_description: You gear up for a day spent in nature's elements, and so should your mobile devices. The E-Case eSeries(TM) 8 Case is small in size, but impressive in protection and functionality. Built for smaller smartphones, point-and-shoot cameras and other palmed-sized electronics. Touch-screen-compatible windows allow full use of your device with guaranteed submersible protection. Every case is individually tested to meet the IPX7 standard of withstanding submersion in 1m of water for 30 min. 1-step, waterproof SealLock(TM) zipper and rugged RF-welded seams guarantee protection from the elements. PVC-free materials. E-Case eSeries 8 Case has die-cut lash points for tethering. Fits BlackBerry Curve(TM), BlackBerry Bold(TM), HTC Wildfire S(R), Motorola ATRIX(R), Apple iPhone(R) 4, 4s devices, and other small phones. Closeout.
short_description: You gear up for a day spent in nature's elements, and so should your mobile devices. The E-Case eSeries(TM) 8 Case is small in size, but impressive in protection and functionality.
